name: AI Hacking

advancements.name: Total Control
advancements.text: You take the hacked synthetic's action. You may use its powers and abilities.

advancements.name: Power Down
advancements.text: When you have a creature hacked, you may use your action to attempt to shut it down. To do so, make an Intelligence check contested by the hacked creature's Intelligence check. If you win the contest, the creature becomes incapacitated for 1 hour and the power ends.

html:
Target a synthetic creature within . It must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or it becomes Hacked (it is considered and can't use powers or abilities). If you or creatures that are friendly to you are fighting it, it has advantage on the saving throw.

On its turn, the hacked creature attacks the closest creature hostile to the power caster, making a ranged weapon attack or melee attack if it does not have a weapon. If there are no hostile creatures within range, the hacked creature uses its turn to dash towards the closest hostile creature.

Each time the hacked creature takes damage, it makes a new Intelligence saving throw against the power. If the saving throw succeeds, the power ends.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this power using a 4th-level power slot, the duration is concentration, up to 10 minutes. When you use a 5th-level power slot, the duration is concentration, up to 1 hour.

name: Annihilation Field

advancements.name: Disorient
advancements.text: Creatures that fail the Constitution saving throw have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

html:
Spin a field of dark energy originating from you in a -radius sphere. For the duration, the field moves with you and reduces your walking speed by half.

Each creature within the sphere must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 12d6 necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make the saving throw when it enters the field's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

Any creature within the sphere is . This condition ends immediately if the creature leaves the sphere.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 5th level, increase the radius by .

name: Incinerate

advancements.name: Frozen Combo
advancements.text: When you hit a creature or object with incinerate, if the target is primed cold, you deal a critical hit.

advancements.name: Radial Blast
advancements.text: On a miss, the target makes a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes half damage.

html:
Hurl a high-explosive, plasma round at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged power attack against the target. On a hit, the target is until the end of your next turn and takes 2d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this power ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d10 for each slot level above 1st.
